title: Multi-Style Homepage Design Exploration
description: Create 5+ visually complete test pages showcasing different modern, high-tech design styles for the DCT Micro-Apps homepage. Each page will be fully visual with no functional requirements, allowing for easy comparison and selection of the best design approach.

subtasks.title: Modern Design Research & Inspiration
subtasks.description: Research top-performing modern websites and apps (Linear, Vercel, Figma, Stripe, Notion, etc.) and create inspiration board
subtasks.deliverable: Design inspiration document with categorized examples

subtasks.title: Design System Analysis & Extension
subtasks.description: Audit current design system components and tokens, identify gaps for new design styles

subtasks.title: Style Definition & Branding
subtasks.description: Define 5+ distinct design styles with clear visual characteristics and brand alignment
subtasks.deliverable: Style guide document with visual specifications

subtasks.title: Component Architecture Planning
subtasks.description: Plan reusable component structure for easy style switching and component variants system

subtasks.title: Neon Cyberpunk Style
subtasks.description: Create neon cyberpunk style with electric blues/purples, neon glows, dark backgrounds, futuristic typography
subtasks.deliverable: Fully visual neon cyberpunk homepage at /test-pages/neon-cyberpunk

subtasks.title: Minimalist Glass Style
subtasks.description: Create minimalist glass style with glass morphism, subtle transparency, clean lines, minimal colors
subtasks.deliverable: Fully visual minimalist glass homepage at /test-pages/minimalist-glass

subtasks.title: Gradient Futurism Style
subtasks.description: Create gradient futurism style with vibrant gradients, smooth animations, modern shapes, bold typography
subtasks.deliverable: Fully visual gradient futurism homepage at /test-pages/gradient-futurism

subtasks.title: Dark Tech Minimalism
subtasks.description: Create dark tech minimalism style with dark theme, subtle accents, clean typography, tech-focused
subtasks.deliverable: Fully visual dark tech minimalism homepage at /test-pages/dark-tech-minimalism

subtasks.title: Vibrant Modernism Style
subtasks.description: Create vibrant modernism style with bright colors, modern shapes, playful animations, energetic feel
subtasks.deliverable: Fully visual vibrant modernism homepage at /test-pages/vibrant-modernism

subtasks.title: Premium Luxury Style
subtasks.description: Create premium luxury style with elegant typography, subtle animations, premium feel, sophisticated colors
subtasks.deliverable: Fully visual premium luxury homepage at /test-pages/premium-luxury

subtasks.title: Visual Comparison Dashboard
subtasks.description: Create comparison page showing all styles side-by-side with style switcher and visual comparison metrics

subtasks.title: Design Evaluation & Documentation
subtasks.description: Evaluate each style against PRD requirements and create selection criteria matrix

subtasks.title: Cleanup & Organization
subtasks.description: Organize all test pages in /test-pages/ directory and prepare for easy cleanup after selection

requirements.visualCompleteness: Each test page must look 100% complete and production-ready with no placeholder content
requirements.designSystemIntegration: Use existing design system components where possible and extend with new variants
requirements.performanceConsiderations: Optimize animations for smooth performance and ensure accessibility compliance
requirements.organizationCleanup: All test pages in /test-pages/ directory with clear naming convention
requirements.brandAlignment: Each style must align with DCT Micro-Apps brand and target audience

expectedDeliverables: 5+ Complete Test Pages - Each showcasing a distinct design style
Extended Design System - New components and variants for each style
Comparison Dashboard - Interactive tool for comparing styles
Design Evaluation Report - Analysis and recommendations
Documentation - Implementation notes and cleanup instructions
